amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: SEC.__.None of the funds made available by this Act may be used to hire a new director of a national cemetery who is not a veteran.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to hire a director of a national cemetery who is not a veteran.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A010) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Poe (TX) amendment (A010) modified by unanimous consent.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Poe (TX) amendment (A010) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A010) offered by Mr. Poe (TX).
